H0.text: Square is the shape most like the diagram Ernie drew to model Earth's orbit.

H1.text: Oval is the shape most like the diagram Ernie drew to model Earth’s orbit.

H2.text: Triangle is the shape most like the diagram Ernie drew to model Earth's orbit.

H3.text: Rectangle is the shape most like what Ernie drew for Earth's orbit in his diagram.

A4.text: Earth's orbit, also called Earth's revolution, is an ellipse with the Earth–Sun barycenter as one focus

A5.text: the center of the orbit is relatively close to the center of the Sun (relative to the size of the orbit)
